text: Ara yara ekati masajida sthapana karalo ksatisadhanera o abisbasera jan'ya, ara bisbasidera madhye bibheda srstira uddesye, ara tara ghamti sbarupa ye era age allah o tamra rasulera birud'dhe lara'i karachila, tara niscaya'i halapha kare balabe -- ''amara to ceyachilama sudhu bhalo.’’ Kintu allah saksya dicchena ye tara to alabat mithyabadi.
